name: Temperature in the other hemisphere
instruction:
If it is winter in the Northern Hemisphere, then it is summer in the Southern Hemisphere.
For example, if it is -30 degrees Celsius in Russia, it can be hot in Australia, with a temperature 30 degrees Celsius above zero.

To solve the problem:

Set the variable `temp` and assign it a value of any number.
Set the variable `opposite` and assign it the value of the variable `temp` with the opposite sign.

Here is an example that is essentially similar to what needs to be done, but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const number = 5;
const minus = -number;
```
